meanings.definition: A person who makes or sells cards.
meanings.sent1: The carders at the store were busy restocking the greeting cards.
meanings.sent2: The carders displayed their handmade cards at the craft fair.
meanings.sent3: The carders joked about starting a card-making competition.
meanings.sent4: She was a carder in the world of handmade cards, known for her intricate designs.
meanings.sent5: The group of carders worked together to create a beautiful set of holiday cards.

meanings.definition: A tool used for carding wool or other fibers.
meanings.sent1: Grandma used the carders to prepare the wool for knitting.
meanings.sent2: The carders helped separate and straighten the fibers for spinning.
meanings.sent3: The carders accidentally got tangled in a ball of yarn, causing a comical scene.
meanings.sent4: The carders worked their magic on the rough wool, transforming it into soft, fluffy material.
meanings.sent5: The old carders were passed down through generations, each pair holding memories of crafting.
